Battera::

She awoke from her long slumber.  She stood up, stretched her long 
leathery wings and yawned. "Oh man, a fruit bat can't sleep that 
long."  she said flexing her wings, "It puts kinks in my wings. Oh, 
gee,"yawns,"how long have I been napping. Hmm, I wonder."  she walked 
around the cave for something to eat, but found nothing.  She did a 
small test flight around the cave.  She was alittle rusty, but she'd 
iron out the kinks as she kept it up.  She flew around the ceiling of 
the cave for hours, doing aerial manouvers and practicing her 
fighting moves.  She smiled and landed on the cave floor. "Yeah, I 
still got it. I could take on a flier and win, peice of energon pie. 
No sweat. Battera, you still got what it takes." she said in a 
cheerful voice.  She wanted to go outside the cave and get something 
to eat.  She stood at the cave entrance and use her sonar to see what 
was around.  Other than a few trees with overly ripe fruit, nothing 
was close to the cave. She'd have to go out for a few miles to see 
what was out there.  She decided to wait a bit.  After all, she 
wanted to make sure she could handle anything that she might 
encounter while out flying around.  She went back inside the cave and 
practiced some more.
